attributes.action: bestow upon Scott Johnson and Randy "Randydeluxe" Jordan the title of Companion of Honour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taken from the official government website:

Companion of Honour

Awarded for a pre-eminent and sustained contribution in the arts, science, medicine, or government.

Is The Instance not the epitome of this....?
Does the podcast not stand proud in the achievements of man(and woman)kind?

Should we not honour these men who give there time without asking for reward?

Let you hearts and ears decide!!!

Sign...For the Horde

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
